pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, December 1, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Buenos Aires, Argentina

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G20 working session.

Closed to media.

12:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with President of France Emmanuel Macron.

Room 13, Ground Floor
Costa Salguero Centre
Av. Costanera Rafael Obligado 1221

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G20 Working Luncheon, Session III, held by President of Argentina Mauricio Macri.

Closed to media.

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the G20 Summit concluding session.

Closed to media.

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Prime Minister of the United Kingdom Theresa May.

Blas Room, Mezzanine Level
Costa Salguero Centre
Av. Costanera Rafael Obligado 1221

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Press Conference Room 5, Ground Floor
Costa Salguero Centre
Av. Costanera Rafael Obligado 1221

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

8:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Gr√©goire Trudeau will depart for Ottawa.

Closed to media.
